conversations.body_text: Hi Tianqi Zhu,       I apologize for not responding to you promptly. I see your package has been delivered. Have you received it?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSELM1208112350YQ

Hey,

Yes I got it a while ago

Thanks


On Thu, Jan 15, 2026 at 9:24 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Tianqi Zhu,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
